section.title: General
section.p: For discussion relevant to Hadoop and related projects please subscribe to the Hadoop general mailing list.

section.title: Users
section.p: If you use HCatalog, please subscribe to the HCatalog user mailing list.
The HCatalog user mailing list is : hcatalog-user@incubator.apache.org.

ul.li: Search List Archive on The Mail Archive

section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Developers
section.p: If you'd like to contribute to HCatalog, please subscribe to the HCatalog developer mailing list.
The HCatalog developer mailing list is : hcatalog-dev@incubator.apache.org.

ul.li: Search List Archive on The Mail Archive

section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Commits
section.p: If you'd like to see changes made in HCatalog's version control system then subscribe to the HCatalog commit mailing list.

ul.li: Search List Archive on The Mail Archive
